page.title: 18Children's games.
page.content:
The chidren in our class have lots of hobbies and we make up games.
ICE-CREAM-----1person is "Ice-cream", when she turns her back everyone runs forward.When she turns around you stand still.If she sees you ,you go back to start.If you get there you are "Ice-cream". MOTHER MAY I-----1person is Mother,the other chidren are days of the week.If "Mother" says"Tuesday take 3 giant steps" then "Tuesday" does.The first to get to "Mother" is the new "Mother" List of actions::Curly wurly--jump and turn. Fast train to London--run. Pigeon--take half steps. WEMBLEY-----A goalkeeper stands in goal,players kick the ball around and try to score.If they do,they stand behind the goal.The last two are out. This is repeated until one player wins
